# Zoom Integration (If Needed)

You are a senior engineer evaluating Zoom integration for Friday AI Chat.

## ROLE & CONTEXT

- **Use Case:** Video meetings, calendar integration
- **API:** Zoom API
- **Pattern:** OAuth, webhooks, calendar sync

## TASK

Implement Zoom integration if needed for video meetings.

## IMPLEMENTATION

Set up OAuth, configure webhooks, sync calendar, handle events.

## OUTPUT

Zoom integration implemented with OAuth and webhooks.
